name: Snowball Game (Mattias "Mau" Lundell)
description:
Don't let spring bring you down!

Roll around in Snowball game and try to not melt now when spring is arriving. Gather the snowpiles scattered around the map, but watch out for the gravel!

We made this!

Snowball game is a Game Jam project made during the Game Changers Game Jam pre futuregames start spring 2020. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell, Aldo Sartori,  Gustav Dyrendahl, Gustav Erik Lidén and Isaac Olander. This game was made February 2020 in Unreal engine 4.
